text: Everyone who has ever eaten a tub of ice cream after a tough day/breakup.
Everyone who has a 'breakup anthem' song.
Everyone who has dramatically changed their hair after a relationship ended.
Everyone who believes 'time heals all wounds' when it comes to heart-break.
Everyone who has ever stalked an ex's social media (be honest!).
Everyone who is still friends with an ex.
Everyone who thinks rebound relationships are a bad idea.
Everyone who has written sad poetry or songs after a breakup.
Everyone who learned valuable lessons from a past breakup.
Everyone who thinks being single can be awesome.
